title: AI Weekly

definitions.CoT Feedback: Instruction comprehension, Task positioning, CoT generation

summary: The slide presents an overview of AI, focusing on the integration of CoT Feedback and GPT-4 in AI applications. It includes a diagram illustrating the process of AI in action, with components like Vision Encoder, Long-Term Memory, and Short-Term Memory. The slide also provides a task example and explains the role of CoT Feedback in AI.
